name: Premium Cat-Eye Frame
description: Premium cat-eye frames with luxurious details and sophisticated styling.

ai_enhanced.feature_summary: These premium cat-eye frames are crafted from high-quality acetate in a rich tortoise pattern. The upswept design and luxurious details enhance their sophisticated appeal.
ai_enhanced.style_description: These cat-eye frames exude vintage glamour with a modern twist. The upswept silhouette enhances cheekbones and adds a feminine touch to any look. The tortoise pattern adds warmth and dimension, creating a luxurious aesthetic. With Gucci's signature approach to luxury, these frames blend bold design with premium materials and craftsmanship.

recommendationReason: Based on your style preferences and face shape

name: Vintage Aviator Frame
description: Iconic aviator frames with a vintage-inspired design and timeless appeal.

ai_enhanced.feature_summary: These classic aviator frames feature a distinctive teardrop shape and gold metal construction. The double bridge and sleek temples add to their iconic design.
ai_enhanced.style_description: These aviator frames deliver the iconic teardrop silhouette that has remained fashionable for decades. Originally designed for pilots, their distinctive style projects confidence and effortless cool. The gold finish adds a touch of luxury that elevates any outfit. As expected from Ray-Ban, these frames deliver timeless style with exceptional quality and craftsmanship.

recommendationReason: Popular with customers who viewed similar products

name: Rimless Titanium Frame
description: Minimalist rimless frames made from premium titanium for lightweight comfort.

ai_enhanced.feature_summary: These rimless titanium frames offer exceptional lightness with a premium feel. The sleek silver temples and minimalist design provide understated sophistication.
ai_enhanced.style_description: These rimless frames offer a sophisticated, understated aesthetic that's perfect for professional settings. The absence of rims creates an almost invisible look that highlights your natural features. The premium titanium construction ensures incredible lightness and durability. With Calvin Klein's minimalist aesthetic, these frames offer clean lines and contemporary styling.

recommendationReason: Matches your face shape compatibility preferences
